thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com.au | airportrentals.com.au | 2 of 43
thread.title: Anne Leach

author: Anne Leach
title: Anne Leach
text:
Both rentals pick up/drop off went very smoothly with friendly helpful staff. The only issue I had was with the airportrentals.com.au website. On both bookings I paid extra insurance to remove the Excess on the rental cars. This turned out to be a totally unrelated insurance cover. Both car rental companies ( Budget & Europcar) stated that if I was to have an accident I would be required to pay the $4000+ Excess to them & then reclaim through the insurance cover on the website. This is not explained clearly on this site & the insurance company address seemed to be based in N.Z. It seemed an unnecessarily convoluted way to organize insurance & I'm glad I did not have to put it to the test.
I would not use this site again but would go directly through a car rental site & use their insurance cover.
